definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Is 14:29 a serpent, usu. venomous (poss. from above √, from burning effect of poison);—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Nu 21:8 (JE; on Ar. parallels v. Jacob:Ar. Dichter ii. 93, iv. 10 f.), appos. ´[[נׇחָשׁ שׂ]]: De 8:15, pl. [[הַנְּחָשִׁים הַשְּׂרָפִים]] Nu 21:6; a flying serpent, or dragon, [[שָׂרָף מְעוֹפֵף]] Is 14:29, Is 30:6.
